name: alerts
description: Connect to the Via alerts server to create, update, and handle alerts.
author: Dakota Gordon

confirmCancelAlert.title: Confirm Before Canceling Alerts
confirmCancelAlert.description: Show a confirmation windows before canceling an active alert.

notifyCreatedAlert.title: Notify On Created Alert
notifyCreatedAlert.description: Show a notification when an alert is successfully created.

notifyUpdatedAlert.title: Notify On Updated Alert
notifyUpdatedAlert.description: Show a notification when an alert is successfully updated.

notifyExpiredAlert.title: Notify On Expired Alert
notifyExpiredAlert.description: Show a notification when an alert expires before it is triggered.

notifyCanceledAlert.title: Notify On Canceled Alert
notifyCanceledAlert.description: Show a notification when an alert is canceled.
